languages.text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.
languages.original_text:
Ассасин бежит по прямой на расстояние до {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} клеток. До своего следующего хода он получает на {uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} меньше урона от {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g}, а также +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от противников, через позиции которых он пробежал.
Если ассасин не бежал через клетки, на которых находятся противники, то в конце своего хода он получает +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g} до тех пор, пока снова не начнет движение.
При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.
После первого применения на том же ходу {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно применить еще 1 раз без затрат ОД.

traits.locale_text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to <u>(1 + AGI bonus/2)</u> cells, suffering −<u>Assassin's WS bonus</u> less damage from attacks of opportunity and gaining +<u>(3 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% dodge against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin hasn't dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +<u>(3 × Assassin's PER bonus)</u>% cover efficiency to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Doesn't stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this ability again for free.

The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to <u>1+(AGI bonus)/2</u> cells, suffering -<u>(Assassin's WS bonus)</u> less damage from attacks of opportunity and gaining +<u>3×(Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% dodge against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin hasn't dash through an enemy, at the end of their turn they gain +<u>3×(Assassin's PER bonus)</u>% cover efficiency to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Doesn't stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this ability again for free.

The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Assassin hasn't dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Doesn't stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

languages.text:
Ассасин бежит по прямой на расстояние до {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} клеток. До своего следующего хода он получает на {uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} меньше урона от {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g}, а также +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от противников, через позиции которых он пробежал.

The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.

traits.locale_text:
Ассасин бежит по прямой на расстояние до <u>(1 + бонус ЛВК / 2)</u> клеток. До своего следующего хода он получает на <u>бонус ББ ассасина</u> меньше урона от атак по возможности, а также +<u>(3 × бонус ЛВК ассасина)</u>% к уклонению от противников, через позиции которых он пробежал.
Если ассасин не бежал через клетки, на которых находятся противники, то в конце своего хода он получает +<u>(3 × бонус ВОС ассасина)</u>% к эффективности укрытия до тех пор, пока снова не начнет движение.
При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.
После первого применения на том же ходу способность можно применить еще 1 раз без затрат ОД.

Ассасин бежит по прямой на расстояние до <u>(1 + бонус ЛВК / 2)</u> клеток. До своего следующего хода он получает на <u>бонус ББ ассасина</u> меньше урона от атак по возможности, а также +<u>(3 × бонус ЛВК ассасина)</u>% к уклонению от противников, через позиции которых он пробежал.
Если ассасин не бежал через клетки, на которых находятся противники, то в конце своего хода он получает +<u>(3 × бонус ВОС ассасина)</u>% к эффективности укрытия до тех пор, пока снова не начнет движение.
При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.
После первого применения на том же ходу способность можно применить еще 1 раз без затрат ОД.

Ассасин бежит по прямой на расстояние до {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} клеток. До своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} он получает на {uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} меньше урона от {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атак по возможности{/g}, а также +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} от противников, через позиции которых он пробежал.
Если ассасин не бежал через клетки, на которых находятся противники, то в конце своего хода он получает +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% к эффективности {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}укрытия{/g} до тех пор, пока снова не начнет движение.
При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.
После первого применения на том же ходу {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно применить еще 1 раз без затрат ОД.

languages.text:
刺客沿着直线冲刺，最多可冲刺{uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}格。此次移动受到的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}的伤害降低{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}点。此外，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%，效果持续至刺客的下个回合为止。
如果刺客没有穿过任何敌人，那么在刺客的回合结束时，刺客从所有掩体获得的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}保护效果{/g}提高{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%，此效果持续至刺客移动为止。
此效果无法多次叠加。
首次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后，刺客可以无消耗地再次使用此能力。
languages.original_text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

traits.locale_text:
刺客沿着直线冲刺，最多可冲刺<u>（1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>格。此次移动受到的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}的伤害降低，伤害减免等同于<u>刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}加值</u>。此外，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高<u>（3×刺客的敏捷加值）</u>%，效果持续至刺客的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。
如果刺客没有穿过任何敌人，那么在刺客的回合结束时，刺客从所有{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}获得的保护效果提高<u>（3×刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}加值）</u>%，此效果持续至刺客移动为止。
此效果无法多次叠加。
首次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后，刺客可以无消耗地再次使用此能力。

刺客沿着直线冲刺，最多可冲刺{uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}格。此次移动受到的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}的伤害降低，伤害减免等同于{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}。此外，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%，效果持续至刺客的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。
如果刺客没有穿过任何敌人，那么在刺客的回合结束时，刺客从所有{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}获得的保护效果提高{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%，此效果持续至刺客移动为止。
此效果无法多次叠加。
首次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后，刺客可以无消耗地再次使用此能力。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}沿着直线冲刺，最多可冲刺{uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}格。此次移动受到的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}点。此外，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%，效果持续至刺客的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。
如果刺客没有穿过任何敌人，那么在刺客的回合结束时，刺客从所有掩体获得的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}保护效果{/g}提高{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%，此效果持续至刺客移动为止。
此效果无法多次叠加。
首次使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后，刺客可以无消耗地再次使用此能力。

languages.text:
El asesino corre en línea recta un máximo de {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} casillas, sufriendo −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} menos de daño causado por {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y obteniendo un +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra los enemigos a los que haya atravesado en su carrera. Esta bonificación dura hasta el próximo turno del asesino.
Si el asesino no pasa a través de ningún enemigo en su carrera, al final de su turno obtiene un +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} hasta que el asesino se mueva.
Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Después del primer uso, el asesino puede utilizar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} otra vez sin coste alguno.
languages.original_text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} corre en línea recta un máximo de {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} casillas, sufriendo −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} menos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} causado por {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y obteniendo un +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra los enemigos a los que haya atravesado en su carrera. Esta bonificación dura hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino.
Si el asesino no pasa a través de ningún enemigo en su carrera, al final de su turno obtiene un +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} hasta que el asesino se mueva.
Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Después del primer uso, el asesino puede utilizar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} otra vez sin coste alguno.

El asesino corre en línea recta un máximo de {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} casillas, sufriendo −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} menos de daño causado por {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y obteniendo un +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} contra los enemigos a los que haya atravesado en su carrera. Esta bonificación dura hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino.
Si el asesino no pasa a través de ningún enemigo en su carrera, al final de su turno obtiene un +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % de eficacia de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}cobertura{/g} hasta que el asesino se mueva.
Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Después del primer uso, el asesino puede utilizar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} otra vez sin coste alguno.

languages.text:
Der Assassine sprintet bis zu {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} Felder entlang in einer geraden Linie, er erleidet −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} weniger Schaden durch {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und erhält +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen die Feinde, durch die er bis zum nächsten Assassinen-Zug sprintet.
Wenn der Assassine durch keine Feinde hindurch gesprintet ist, erhält er am Ende seines Zugs +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} auf seine Deckung, bis er sich bewegt.
Wird nicht mit sich selbst gestapelt.
Nach dem ersten Einsatz kann der Assassine diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut kostenlos einsetzen.
languages.original_text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} sprintet bis zu {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} Felder entlang in einer geraden Linie, er erleidet −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} weniger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und erhält +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen die Feinde, durch die er bis zum nächsten Assassinen-{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} sprintet.
Wenn der Assassine durch keine Feinde hindurch gesprintet ist, erhält er am Ende seines Zugs +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} auf seine Deckung, bis er sich bewegt.
Wird nicht mit sich selbst gestapelt.
Nach dem ersten Einsatz kann der Assassine diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut kostenlos einsetzen.

Der Assassine sprintet bis zu {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Felder entlang in einer geraden Linie, er erleidet − dem {uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} entsprechend weniger Schaden durch {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und erhält +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} gegen die Gegner, durch die er bis zur nächsten Assassinen-{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} sprintet.
Wenn der Assassine durch keine Gegner hindurch gesprintet ist, erhält er am Ende seiner Runde +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckungseffizienz{/g} auf seine Deckung, bis er sich bewegt.
Wird nicht mit sich selbst aufaddiert.
Nach dem ersten Einsatz kann der Assassine diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} erneut kostenlos einsetzen.

languages.text:
L'assassin s'élance en ligne droite sur un maximum de {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cases, subissant {uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} points de dégâts en moins en cas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et gagnant +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} contre les ennemis au travers desquels il passe jusqu'à son prochain tour.
Si l'assassin n'est passé au travers d'aucun ennemi, à la fin de son tour, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} augmente de +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % jusqu'à ce qu'il se déplace.
Non cumulable.
Après la première utilisation, l'assassin peut réutiliser cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} gratuitement.
languages.original_text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

traits.locale_text:
L'Assassin s'élance en ligne droite sur un maximum de <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> cases, subissant -<u>bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}CA{/g} de l'Assassin</u> points de dégâts en moins en cas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et gagnant +<u>(3 × bonus d'AGI de l'Assassin)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} contre les ennemis au travers desquels il passe jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Si l'Assassin n'est passé au travers d'aucun ennemi, à la fin de son tour il gagne +<u>(3 × bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} de l'Assassin)</u> % sur l'efficacité de sa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g} jusqu'à ce qu'il se déplace.
Non cumulable.
Après la première utilisation, l'Assassin peut réutiliser cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} gratuitement.

L'Assassin s'élance en ligne droite sur un maximum de {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cases, subissant -{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} points de dégâts en moins en cas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et gagnant +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} contre les ennemis au travers desquels il passe jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
Si l'Assassin n'est passé au travers d'aucun ennemi, à la fin de son tour il gagne +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} % sur l'efficacité de sa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g} jusqu'à ce qu'il se déplace.
Non cumulable.
Après la première utilisation, l'Assassin peut réutiliser cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} gratuitement.

languages.text:
アサシンが直線に最大{uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}セルダッシュする。このダッシュで通過した敵に対して、アサシンの次のターンまで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}によるダメージを{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}分減少させ、アサシンは{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を得る。
アサシンが敵を通過しなかった場合、ターン終了時に、アサシンが移動するまで、+{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽率{/g}を得る。
この効果は累積しない。
初回使用後、アサシンはこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を消費なしで再使用できる。
languages.original_text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

traits.locale_text:
アサシンが直線に最大<u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}/2)</u>セルダッシュする。このダッシュで通過した敵に対して、アサシンの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}によるダメージを<u>アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}ボーナス</u>分減少させ、アサシンは<u>(3 × アサシンのAGIボーナス)</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を得る。
アサシンが敵を通過しなかった場合、ターン終了時に、アサシンが移動するまで、<u>(3 × アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}ボーナス)</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}率を得る。
この効果は累積しない。
初回使用後、アサシンはこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を消費なしで再使用できる。

アサシンが直線に最大{uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}セルダッシュする。このダッシュで通過した敵に対して、アサシンの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}によるダメージを{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}分減少させ、アサシンは{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を得る。
アサシンが敵を通過しなかった場合、ターン終了時に、アサシンが移動するまで、{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}率を得る。
この効果は累積しない。
初回使用後、アサシンはこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を消費なしで再使用できる。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が直線に最大{uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}セルダッシュする。このダッシュで通過した敵に対して、アサシンの次のターンまで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}分減少させ、アサシンは{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を得る。
アサシンが敵を通過しなかった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に、アサシンが移動するまで、+{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽率{/g}を得る。
この効果は累積しない。
初回使用後、アサシンはこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を消費なしで再使用できる。

languages.text:
Suikastçı, düz bir çizgide en fazla {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} hücreye kadar ileriye doğru atılır. Bu sayede {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarından{/g} {uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} daha az hasar alır ve yarıp geçtiği düşmanlara karşı +%{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, Suikastçı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek sürer.
Suikastçı, hiçbir düşmanı yarıp geçmezse turunun sonunda %{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, Suikastçı hareket edene dek sürer.
Etki üst üste birikmez.
Suikastçı, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} ilk kez kullandıktan sonra hiç EP harcamadan tekrar kullanabilir.
languages.original_text:
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
